value:
This world is so close to the
heavens... When you summoned me,
I assumed my time had come!

I hope the children at the orphanage
are doing well without me...

I applaud your constant patrols.
If I could simply keep up, I would
join you, but alas...

Be careful not to overextend
yourself. It's important to take
time to simply pause and reflect.

Grooming is simple with a head
like mine! If you like, I could give
you the same cut...

I am Wrys, a humble curate.
I cannot fight, but this staff I carry
can heal the wounded.

I suppose miracles happen
after all!

At my age, this feels like a job
well done!

Mm. Old age is catching up
to me...

I see you're a risk taker! I'll try
to live up to your expectations.

I am Wrys, a humble curate.
I cannot fight, but this staff I carry
can heal the wounded.

I must admit...being surrounded by
so many young people has me
pushing myself beyond my years.$k$pBut the journey has been very
much worthwhile. I have seen that
there is still much I can do.$k$pI will keep my prayers with those
who have guided me on my way...
and that includes you.$k$pPlease continue to use this feeble
old man in whatever way will help
your cause.$k$pLet all be as the gods will.
はっ
それっ
うああっ！
I'm sunk...
I'm...not good at this.
My apologies!
Here it comes.
If I must...
Farewell...
Huhuhu
Here to do what I can.
May my healing help.
Are you injured? Let me help.
Oh, my my...
How can a humble curate help you today?
I wonder how the children are faring back home...
I shall attend to your wounds whenever you need.
Yes?
Well, well...
Glad to help.
